mapper.insert: insert into asset_kefu_census ( job_id, day_count, day_repay_count, all_count, all_repay_count, create_time ) values ( #{jobId}, #{dayCount}, #{dayRepayCount}, #{allCount}, #{allRepayCount}, #{createTime} )
mapper.select:
select kc.id as id, kc.job_id as jobId, bu.user_name as userName, kc.all_count as allCount, kc.all_repay_count as allRepayCount, kc.day_count as dayCount, kc.day_repay_count as dayRepayCount, kc.create_time as createTime from asset_kefu_census kc left join back_user bu on bu.id = kc.job_id where 1=1
and DATE_FORMAT(kc.create_time, '%Y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{beginTime}, '%Y%m%d') and DATE_FORMAT(kc.create_time, '%Y%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime}, '%Y%m%d')
and bu.user_name = #{userName}
order by kc.create_time DESC

SELECT count( DISTINCT ( ba.borrow_order_id ) ) AS dayCount FROM asset_borrow_assign ba LEFT JOIN asset_borrow_order bo ON bo.id = ba.borrow_order_id WHERE ba.del_flg= 0
and DATE_FORMAT( ba.create_time, '%Y%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d')
and DATE_FORMAT( ba.create_time, '%Y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d')
AND bo.STATUS in (30,34)
AND ba.job_id = #{jobId}

SELECT ifNULL(count(ba.id),0) FROM asset_borrow_assign ba LEFT JOIN asset_borrow_order bo ON ba.borrow_order_id = bo.id LEFT JOIN asset_repayment ar ON ar.asset_order_id = bo.id WHERE ba.del_flg = 0 AND ar.id = #{repaymentId}
